aboutNgo: Thozhan is a social reforming group with a motto to transform the youth into leaders. By means of various activities, Thozhan provides a platform for all volunteers to become a warrior now and a leader then. Their aim is to transform each and every aspiring individual into a Leader.
aboutProject: Dear All,</br> With our farmers community battling in freezing weather fighting for all our future, as announced we are providing them a Winter Care package, which is the least we could do for those who feed us.  </br> </br> The package consists the following: </br> 1. Tarpaulin sheet </br> 2. Woollen blanket </br> 3. Sweater</br> 4. Woollen cap</br> 5. Woollen gloves</br> 6. Woollen Socks</br> </br> We are ordering 1000 of each item and each package of these 6 items comes to approximately Rs 875. We want to raise this fund within the next 5 days so we could help the farmers warm and safe.  </br> </br> Please do open your hearts and send how much ever you can. Also share it with your family and friends and any organisation you are a part of. Thank you all so much. ![Protest 1](https://firebasestorage.googleapis.com/v0/b/gr-live.appspot.com/o/grcare%2Fregional%2Fin%2F31%2F3100%2Fngo%2FDRl4IBHNfDdxwDCkp6Ql%2Ffundraiser%2FN9QJIpw18vHjGwV3Jz0T%2F512_pic2.jpg?alt=media&token=3b80c45c-adde-49c9-a3f3-dd9f3116257b)  ![Protest 2](https://firebasestorage.googleapis.com/v0/b/gr-live.appspot.com/o/grcare%2Fregional%2Fin%2F31%2F3100%2Fngo%2FDRl4IBHNfDdxwDCkp6Ql%2Ffundraiser%2FN9QJIpw18vHjGwV3Jz0T%2F512_pic1.jpg?alt=media&token=f8fd6556-5e03-442f-975f-9b7800f68481)
name: To Farmers With Love
